Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Identify and sort clothes by fabric type and ironing requirements.', '2. Set up the ironing boa
rd and adjust the iron settings for the first clothing batch.', '3. Iron the clothes according to th
eir requirements.', '4. Fold or hang the ironed clothes appropriately.']

def category_for_ironing(clothes:item):
    # Function to determine if clothes need to be sorted by category for ironing
    symbol needs_sorting=exists type: item : is_clothes(type) and on(type, clothes)
    return needs_sorting

behavior sort_clothes_by_type(basket:item):
    body:
        foreach clothes: item:
            if is_clothes(clothes) and inside(clothes, basket) and category_for_ironing(clothes):
                observe(clothes,"Check fabric type and ironing requirements")
                # Observe to identify fabric type and ironing requirements for each clothing item

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket)
        # Select the clothes basket

        sort_clothes_by_type(basket)
        # Sort clothes by fabric type from the basket

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Sort the clothes by material and heat setting required.', '2. Iron the clothes one by one accor
ding to the sorted categories.']

def requires_special_care(clothes:item):
    symbol special_care=exists setting: item : surfaces(setting) and close(setting, clothes)
    return special_care

behavior sort_clothes_by_material(clothes:item, basket:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(clothes, basket) 
        # Ensure the clothes are inside the basket

        # Check if the clothes require special care based on their material
        if requires_special_care(clothes):
            bind setting: item where:
                surfaces(setting) and close(setting, clothes)
            achieve close_char(char, setting) 
            # Approach the clothes with special care setting
        else:
            observe(clothes, "Determine material and heat setting requirement") 
            # Observe to determine the material and heat setting for clothes
            
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket)
        # Select the basket for clothes

        foreach clothes: item:
            if is_clothes(clothes) and inside(clothes, basket):
                sort_clothes_by_material(clothes, basket)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Sort the clothes in the laundry basket to identify which ones need ironing.', '2. Iron each pie
ce of clothing that requires it.']

def needs_ironing(clothing:item):
    # Function to check if an item of clothing needs ironing
    # This function returns True if the item is clean and needs ironing
    symbol needs_ironing=not dirty(clothing) and is_clothes(clothing)
    return needs_ironing

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket)
        # Select the laundry basket
        
        foreach clothing: item:
            if is_clothes(clothing) and inside(clothing, basket) and not visited(clothing):
                # Check all unvisited pieces of clothing inside the basket
                observe(clothing,"Check if the clothing needs ironing")
                # Observe the clothing to determine if it needs ironing

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Gather all clothes from the laundry basket that need ironing.', '2. Set up the ironing station 
and adjust the iron to the appropriate temperature for the clothes.', '3. Iron each piece of clothin
g in the basket.']

def is_clothes_needing_ironing(item: item):
    # Determine if the item is clothing and requires ironing, logic can be added further if known
    return is_clothes(item)

behavior gather_clothes_for_ironing(laundry_basket:item):
    body:
        foreach c: item:
            if is_clothes_needing_ironing(c) and inside(c, laundry_basket):
                observe(c, "Check if the clothes need ironing")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind laundry_basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(laundry_basket)
        # Select the laundry basket
        gather_clothes_for_ironing(laundry_basket)
